values.name: i-am
values.description: I-Am service - used to respond to Who-Is requests with device identification information.

values.name: i-have
values.description: I-Have service - used to respond to Who-Has requests indicating possession of a specific object.

values.name: time-synchronization
values.description: Time Synchronization service - used to synchronize time across BACnet devices.

values.name: unconfirmed-audit-notification
values.description: Unconfirmed Audit Notification service - used to report audit log entries.

values.name: unconfirmed-cov-notification
values.description: Unconfirmed COV (Change of Value) Notification service - used to report property value changes.

values.name: unconfirmed-cov-notification-multiple
values.description: Unconfirmed COV Notification Multiple service - used to report multiple property value changes.

values.name: unconfirmed-event-notification
values.description: Unconfirmed Event Notification service - used to report alarm and event information.

values.name: unconfirmed-private-transfer
values.description: Unconfirmed Private Transfer service - used for proprietary or vendor-specific services.

values.name: unconfirmed-text-message
values.description: Unconfirmed Text Message service - used to send text messages to operator displays.

values.name: utc-time-synchronization
values.description: UTC Time Synchronization service - used to synchronize UTC time across BACnet devices.

values.name: who-am-i
values.description: Who-Am-I service - used to request identification of the local device.

values.name: who-has
values.description: Who-Has service - used to discover which device has a specific object.

values.name: who-is
values.description: Who-Is service - used to discover BACnet devices on the network.

values.name: write-group
values.description: Write Group service - used to write to multiple properties in a single operation.

values.name: you-are
values.description: You-Are service - used to respond to Who-Am-I requests with device identification.
